translation.en: We're not playing war. War's not even a game.
translation.fr: On y joue pas. C'est nul.

translation.en: -[Stacy] We are too playing war. C'mon. -[Jeff] It's total chance, Stace.
translation.fr:
- Allez, bataille.
- Un jeu de hasard.

translation.en: Winner picks the game, Jeff. That's your rules.
translation.fr: Le vainqueur décide. C'est ta règle.

translation.en: [Eric] Okay, who wants a little Mexican hair of the dog?
-[Amy] I'll have some. -[Eric] Oh, you'll definitely have some.
translation.fr:
- Un petit coup.
- Toi, c'est sûr.

translation.en: -Come on, Jeff. -No, keep that away from me.
translation.fr:
- Allez, Jeff.
- Éloigne ça de moi.

translation.en: Well, that's not what you were saying last night.
translation.fr: Tu disais pas ça hier soir.

translation.en: [laughs] Seriously, Mr. Nude Lifeguard. What was up with that?
translation.fr:
Franchement, M. le maître-nageur
nudiste. C'était quoi, ce plan ?

translation.en: I don't know what you guys are talking about.
translation.fr: Je vois pas de quoi vous parlez.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, I declare war.
-No, I'm flushed. I'm just hot. -You're not flushed.
translation.fr: Non, j'ai des couleurs. J'ai chaud.

translation.en: -[Eric] I knew you would. -[Stacy] You did?
translation.fr:
- Je t'en savais capable.
- T'y croyais ?

translation.en: Okay. [Eric] I did. Of course I did.
translation.fr: J'y croyais. Bien sûr que oui.

translation.en: Why don't you look under the towel there?
-[Amy] Look under your towel. -[Stacy] It's not.
-[Amy] Under your towel. -Why would it be under our towel?
-[Amy] I don't know, I think I was... -Did you come lay under here?
translation.fr:
- Comme ça.
- Tu te serais allongée dessous ?

translation.en: [Jeff] We're gonna find it, honey. [Amy] It's my favorite earring.
translation.fr:
- Chérie, on la trouvera.
- Mes boucles d'oreilles préférées !
Elle doit être dans la piscine.

translation.en: [speaking with a German accent] I found it. It's yours, I think.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai trouvée. C'est à toi ?
Je crois bien.

translation.en: Thank you so much! [Jeff] Thank you.
Hey, do you want a drink?
-It's got ice in it. -[Mathias] It's okay.
translation.fr: Il y a de la glace dedans. Pas grave !

translation.en: -That means it has ice, Eric. -[Mathias] Thank you.
translation.fr: Donc il y a de la glace.

- Tu viens d'où ?
- À la base, de Munich.

translation.en: No, it's not. The water system here is contaminated with human feces.
translation.fr:
Le réseau d'eau
est contaminé par les matières fécales.

translation.en: Okay? So your drinks are, like, blended with hepatitis B.
translation.fr:
Donc, tous vos verres sont mixés
à l'hépatite B.

translation.en: -[Amy] Yes. Hepatitis B. -How do you know each other?
They're best friends, and we're their boyfriends.
translation.fr:
Elles sont amies
et nous, les petits copains.

translation.en: [Jeff] How about you? Are you here by yourself?
translation.fr: Et toi ? T'es ici tout seul ?

translation.en: No, with my brother, but he left with some girl, yeah.
translation.fr:
J'étais avec mon frère,
mais il a filé avec une nana.
Il a filé de l'hôtel ? Du Mexique ?

translation.en: Oh, no, no. She's an archaeologist. He went with her to a dig site.
translation.fr:
Elle est archéologue.
Il l'a accompagnée sur des fouilles.

translation.en: And what are they digging? [Jeff] Like an excavation?
Yeah, it's ruins, I think. A Mayan temple.
translation.fr: Une ruine. Un temple maya, je crois.

translation.en: [Jeff] Kind of like the ones that nobody here wanted to go to...
translation.fr: Le genre de truc que personne voulait voir

translation.en: -Yes, Jeff. -...the entire time that we've been here.
translation.fr: que personne voulait voir durant tout notre séjour ici.

translation.en: Apparently, it's not even in the guidebooks.
translation.fr: Il n'est pas dans les guides.

translation.en: Yeah, see, Jeff, that's something I would do.

translation.fr:
- Ah oui ?
- Ça a l'air marrant.

translation.en: [Mathias] Well, if you're interested, I'm going there tomorrow.
translation.fr: Si ça vous plaît, j'y vais demain.

translation.en: Heinrich was supposed to be back by now,
translation.fr: Henrich aurait dû déjà être de retour,

translation.en: but he must be having a good time.
So what do you guys think?
[Jeff] Huh? Ancient Mayan temple off the beaten path?
translation.fr:
Un ancien temple maya
hors des sentiers battus.

translation.en: I don't know, a little culture before we leave?
translation.fr: Un peu de culture avant notre retour.

Je veux y aller. - C'est vrai ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Since I just kicked Jeff's ass in cards, I got nothing left to do here. -[Eric] Wow! -[chuckles]
translation.fr:
Depuis que j'ai écrasé Jeff aux cartes,
j'ai plus rien à faire ici.

translation.en: Well, yeah, I mean, as long as I'm back for make-your-own-taco night, I'm in.
translation.fr:
Tant qu'on rentre pour se faire nos tacos
à dîner, je suis partant.

translation.en: Do we have to wake up early?
You come to beach tonight? To party?
translation.fr: Venir à la plage ce soir ? Fête ?

translation.en: They are supposed to be coming with me tomorrow,
but maybe it's a big mistake.
-They're all fucking crazy in the head. -[all laughing]
So, there was this hotel heiress who dyed her hair blonde.
translation.fr:
Donc il y avait cette héritière d'hôtel
blonde décolorée...

translation.en: [Stacy] But the carpet didn't match the drapes.
translation.fr:
Mais la moquette
n'était pas assortie aux rideaux.

translation.en: What is it? What's the joke? What's so funny? I'm not...
translation.fr:
C'est quoi, la blague ?
Pourquoi c'est si drôle ?

translation.en: [Eric] You don't want to know, Mathias.
But the hardwood floor underneath it was all scuffed up and dirty!
translation.fr:
Mais le parquet en dessous
était tout piétiné et sale !

translation.en: -[Stacy] But then it was too slippery. -Ow!
I'm just not feeling this one.
Jeff, buddy, we got two days left. I wanna see some moves.
translation.fr:
Jeff. Il reste deux jours.
Je veux te voir bouger.

translation.en: [Amy] It's just like playing the trombone.
Jeff used to play the trombone in high school.
translation.fr: Jeff jouait du trombone au lycée.

translation.en: -[Eric guffaws] Jeffrey on the trombone! -[Amy] He won a prize.
Thank you for sharing that with everybody.
Now he's gonna be a doctor.
translation.fr: Et maintenant, il va devenir médecin.

translation.en: And he's gonna win a prize for that.
[Eric] Hey, what's up? How are you?
I'll take some. I'll take some.
Amy, it's time to go to bed. Let's go.
translation.fr:
Amy, c'est l'heure de se mettre au lit.
On y va.

translation.en: All right, I'm calling it a night, guys.
-[giggling] -[Jeff] Good night. Give me a kiss.
-Come here. Stay. -[Jeff] Give me a kiss.
translation.fr:
- Bonne nuit. Un bisou ?
- Viens. - Un bisou.
- Reste.

translation.en: -See ya, buddy! -[Jeff] Make sure she gets home.
translation.fr:
- Salut, mon pote.
- Veille sur elle.

translation.en: -[Jeff] See you guys tomorrow morning. -[Eric] All right.
-[Amy] My boyfriend, the rock star! -[Jeff] Behave.
translation.fr: Mon copain est une rock star !

translation.en: Show me a German dance. Come on.
Drag you? Nobody wants to dance!
translation.fr: Je dois te tirer par les pieds ?

translation.en: [Mathias] You want me to dance? I can't dance. [Amy] It's so beautiful!
translation.fr: Tu veux que je danse ? Je sais pas.

translation.en: So, how much you wanna bet she kisses him?
She's freaking out 'cause Jeff's med school is like 2,000 miles away, okay?
translation.fr:
Elle flippe, la fac de médecine
de Jeff est à deux mille bornes.

translation.en: -[Mathias] You do a twirl. -[Eric] Okay, how much?
[Stacy] She's not gonna kiss him. That's nice.
-It's good, yeah? -How do you do that?

translation.fr:
On parie une gâterie.
Le gagnant en jouira.

translation.en: All right, more of the hips. Use the hips. Like this.
Come here. Come here. I wanna tell you a secret.
translation.fr: Viens là. J'ai un secret à te dire.

translation.en: [Stacy] What are you doing? What are you doing?
I will dance with you, okay?
[Mathias] No. The place that they went, here.
translation.fr: Le lieu où ils sont allés, ici,

translation.en: It's only on this old map. It's gone from the guidebook.
translation.fr:
n'est que sur ce plan.
On le voit pas dans le guide.

translation.en: He's making a copy of the map from the girl Heinrich met, for his friends.
translation.fr:
Il fait une copie de la carte de la fille
que Henrich a rencontrée pour ses amis.

translation.en: Yes, your friends look like they could use a map.
translation.fr: Ils ont l'air d'avoir besoin d'une carte.

translation.en: All right. Give me a couple of minutes?
Do you know what they do to people down here who don't honor their bets?
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qu'on fait aux gens qui n'honorent pas leur pari ?

translation.en: [Eric] No, they do. They take broomsticks,
and they just like, whack, smash their hands.
translation.fr: et ils leur broient les mains.

translation.en: It's a true story. It's kind of brutal, but it happens. What are you gonna do?
translation.fr:
C'est vrai. Un peu brutal,
mais c'est comme ça.

translation.en: Come on! Jeff's gonna be pissed if we miss it.
translation.fr:
Bouge !
Jeff sera furieux si on rate le bus.

translation.en: followed, I'm sure, by the even more frightening whining of Amy.
translation.fr: et pire encore, la complainte d'Amy.

translation.en: No, but I bet she's feeling pretty awkward right about now, don't you?
translation.fr:
Je parie qu'elle doit se sentir
un peu mal ce matin, pas toi ?

translation.en: I mean it. Not a word.
translation.fr: Je suis sérieuse. Pas un mot.

translation.en: Look, it'd be a shame to smash these pretty little hands.
translation.fr:
Ce serait dommage
de broyer ces petites mains.

translation.en: Will you please get in the shower?
Come here for a second. Come here. Come here.
You know, you're in Mexico now, muchacha.
And you can't just lose a bet like that and expect to walk away free.
translation.fr:
Tu peux pas perdre un pari
et espérer t'en tirer.

translation.en: How much do I owe you again?

translation.fr:
- Je devrais peut-être pas y aller.
- Quoi ?

translation.en: You're gonna be back tonight. I'll just, like, sleep until then.
translation.fr:
Tu seras rentré ce soir.
Je pourrai dormir.

translation.en: You wanna spend our last day sleeping?
translation.fr:
Tu vas passer notre dernier jour
de vacances au lit ?

translation.en: I'll just hang out, like read or something.

translation.fr: Je vais traîner et bouquiner. Amy. Allons.

translation.en: [Jeff] People come from all over the world just to see these ruins.
translation.fr:
Les gens viennent du monde entier
voir ces ruines.

translation.en: And this one isn't even on the map.
translation.fr: Et celle-ci n'est sur aucune carte.

translation.en: [Jeff] I'm not taking you to some tourist trap, honey.
translation.fr: C'est pas un piège à touristes.

translation.en: Don't you wanna have some experience or something to shoot,
other than just the beach, the pool, the beach, the pool?
translation.fr:
autre chose que la plage, la piscine,
la plage, la piscine ?

translation.en: Well, you're already dressed. You might as well just go without me.
translation.fr: T'es déjà habillé. Pars sans moi.

translation.en: But I don't wanna go without you.
translation.fr: Mais je veux pas y aller sans toi.

translation.en: [Amy] What are you so happy about?

translation.fr:
- Amy, y a un chiot.
- Henrich ?

translation.en: Hey, how many miles is that?
[Jeff] It's about eleven. Maybe a little bit more.
translation.fr: À peu près onze. Peut-être un peu plus.

translation.en: [Mathias] Then there's a path, which we hike for four kilometers.
translation.fr:
Après, il y a un chemin
où l'on marche sur quatre kilomètres.

translation.en: Okay, no one said anything about a hike.
translation.fr: On m'avait pas parlé de marche.

translation.en: Well, I don't see any cabs. That's a bit of a problem.
translation.fr:
Je vois pas de taxi.
Ça va être un problème.

translation.en: [Amy] No, it's good. Is there a mirror?
translation.fr: Non, ça va. Il y a une glace ?

translation.en: How much... you drive us here?
No, no. This place, no good.
I'll drive you to pyramid. Muy grande. Everybody go.
translation.fr:
Conduire vous pyramide.
Tout le monde content.

translation.en: I take you. I take you.
[Amy] I wanna stay with the puppy.
translation.fr: Je veux rester avec le chiot.

translation.en: -[Stacy] We got new hats. -[Eric] Very nice.
-This is the taxi? -Yeah, this is it. Come on. Let's go.
-[Stacy] My pants are gonna get dirty. -[Amy squealing]
Hey, Jeff. Can you give me some water? Take a picture.
translation.fr:
- Jeff, peux-tu me donner de l'eau ?
- Prends une photo.

translation.en: [Jeff] Is this it? [Mathias] Yeah, this must be.
[Amy] Oh, my God, I'm so glad that's over.
-[Eric] You okay? -[Stacy] My jeans are all dirty.
translation.fr:
Ça va ? - Mon jean est foutu.
- Vous avez un téléphone ?

translation.en: -[Jeff] Do you have a telefono? -[Amy] Thanks.
translation.fr:
- Mon jean est foutu.
- Vous avez un téléphone ? - Si.
- Merci.

translation.en: Wait, how are we gonna get back?
We're gonna call him when we get out.
With what? We're not gonna get a signal out here.
translation.fr: Comment ? Y a pas de signal.

translation.en: My phone should work. It's a world phone.
translation.fr:
Ça doit marcher.
C'est un téléphone satellite.

translation.en: Hello? Can you hear me now?
It's like a 20-mile hike I'm gonna do in flip-flops.
translation.fr: Trente bornes de marche en tongs.

translation.en: -[Jeff] Problem solved. -[Amy] Can I have my sunglasses?
-[Eric] Is that your brother's Jeep? -Yeah, it is.
translation.fr: La Jeep de ton frangin ? Oui.

translation.en: [Eric] Yeah, yeah. Come on, let's go. Ready?

translation.fr: Tu veux monter sur mes épaules ?

translation.en: [Eric] So, there was this girl who got really, really drunk one night.
translation.fr: Il y avait cette fille très soûle un soir.

translation.en: [Stacy] But she sobered up really, really quickly.
translation.fr: Mais elle a pu dessoûler très vite.

translation.en: [Amy] Just a stupid game that they were playing last night.
translation.fr: Le même jeu con qu'hier soir.

translation.en: [Eric] But not before she stuck her tongue down some guy's...
translation.fr:
Mais pas avant d'avoir glissé sa langue
dans la gorge d'un mec.

translation.en: We cross a stream, then there should be a path to the left.
translation.fr:
On traverse un ruisseau
et on doit trouver un sentier à gauche.

translation.en: If we've seen a village, then we've gone too far.
translation.fr: Si on voit un village, on est trop loin.

translation.en: -Wait, there's a village? -Yeah. A Mayan village.
translation.fr: Un village ? Oui. Un village maya.

translation.en: Why did we leave the hotel again?
translation.fr: Pourquoi on n'est pas restés à l'hôtel ?

translation.en: How much further past the stream is it?
[Eric] Yeah, well, I don't see any path.
I'm not gonna scare them. Hello!
-[Eric] You wanna go talk to them? -[Stacy] Yeah.
[Amy] I don't think they speak Spanish.
[Mathias] It's here. This must be it.
translation.fr: C'est là. Ça doit être ça.

translation.en: [Stacy] I don't think that's the right path.
-It's on the map. -Jeff, do you see how old that map looks?
translation.fr: C'est sur la carte. Elle est vieille.

translation.en: And it was covered. Why would it be covered?
translation.fr:
Et il était caché.
Pourquoi ils auraient fait ça ?

translation.en: Maybe the archaeologists don't want people to find their site, guys.
translation.fr: Ils veulent sans doute protéger leur site.

translation.en: Great. They're gonna be thrilled to see us then.
translation.fr: Super. Ils vont adorer qu'on débarque.

translation.en: No, maybe they just found something valuable,
translation.fr: Ils ont pu trouver un trésor,

translation.en: and they don't want people to rob it, and just get the Mayans to keep people away.
translation.fr: ils veulent pas se faire voler.

translation.en: [Eric] How far away is it? [Mathias] It's not far.
translation.fr:
- C'est encore loin ?
- Plus très loin.

- Ça paraît bizarre.
- Tu veux quoi ?

translation.en: [Jeff] Well, what do you wanna do?
translation.fr:
- Ça paraît bizarre.
- Tu veux quoi ? Qu'on revienne sur nos pas ?

translation.en: Just turn around and walk all the way back?
[Amy] A hidden path in the middle of the jungle.
translation.fr: Un sentier dérobé, au milieu de la jungle.

translation.en: [Eric] So, do you think those kids were Mayans?
I mean, aren't the Mayans extinct?
Didn't they die of some fucked-up disease?
translation.fr: Une épidémie les a pas tous tués ?

translation.en: [Eric] We could be walking through an ancient graveyard right now.
translation.fr:
On traverse peut-être
un vieux cimetière.

translation.en: Like a bone depository or something.
-[Stacy] I doubt it. -[Eric mimicking] I doubt it.
[Eric] No, no, I was agreeing with you.
translation.fr: Non, j'étais juste de ton avis.

translation.en: -[Amy] Is... I think this is it. -[Stacy cheering] Finally!
[Amy] Can I have my glasses? -[Jeff] Yeah. -[Eric laughs]
translation.fr:
- Je peux avoir mes lunettes ?
- Oui.

translation.en: [Stacy] Can I have a drink? Thank you.
translation.fr: Je peux en avoir un coup ? Merci.
Il veut sans doute du blé.

translation.en: What, like a toll or something?
What the fuck do they want?
Show a picture of your brother.
translation.fr: Montre les photos de ton frangin.

translation.en: -[Jeff] We're trying to find... -You seen him?
translation.fr:
- On le cherche.
- Vous l'avez vu ?

translation.en: Give to them! Give to them fotografia!
-Want the camera? -[men yelling in foreign language] Easy. Easy, just...
translation.fr:
- Vous le voulez ?
- Du calme, juste...

translation.en: [Stacy] I can't breathe. I can't breathe. Stace. Stace. Look at me.
translation.fr:
- Je peux pas respirer.
- Stace. Regarde-moi.

translation.en: -I can't breathe. -[Jeff] Stacy! Look at me!
[Eric] Come on, we gotta go! Come on!
[Stacy gasping] Oh, my God. Oh, God. Oh, God.

translation.fr: Oh, mon Dieu. Mon Dieu, Dimitri !

translation.en: [Amy sobbing] Why would they do that?
[panting] Really? If there was a signal on the road, you should be able to--
translation.fr: Pourtant t'avais du réseau sur la route.

translation.en: -No, I didn't get one. -What do you mean?
No, I mean, I never said...
"Can you hear me now?" What the fuck was that, Eric?
translation.fr:
- J'ai pas...
- "Allô ?" - C'était quoi ?
- Une blague !

translation.en: What the fuck? It was a joke!
[Stacy] Stop! Stop! Both of you, stop! Please!

translation.fr: C'est cet homme. Il l'a pris.

translation.en: -[Jeff] They're setting up camps. -[Amy] Why are they doing this?
translation.fr: Ils vont camper. Pourquoi ils font ça ?

translation.en: Maybe they're preparing for something, you know. Like a...
translation.fr:
Ils préparent peut-être
quelque chose. Comme un...

translation.en: It has something to do with the ruins.
And now that we're here, they won't let us leave.
translation.fr: Ils viendront pas ici, mais on est coincés là.

translation.en: So, what do we do, just wait for someone to find us?
translation.fr: On va attendre que quelqu'un nous trouve ?

translation.en: Dimitri left them a copy of the map before we left.
translation.fr:
Dimitri leur a copié la carte
avant notre départ.

translation.en: Yeah, and what if they decide not to come, Jeff?
translation.fr: Et s'ils décident de pas venir ?

translation.en: We're supposed to check out of the hotel tomorrow.
The hotel's gonna call the police.
Our flight is tomorrow, Jeff. I know, Amy.
translation.fr:
- Notre vol est demain, Jeff.
- Je sais.

translation.en: But we know what happens if we leave.
translation.fr: T'as vu ce qui arrive si on bouge.

translation.en: Yeah, but what are we gonna eat? Like, where do we sleep?
translation.fr: On va manger quoi ? Où on va...

translation.en: I know. We just don't have that much.
translation.fr: Mais y en a pas beaucoup.

translation.en: Well, why do you get to decide, Jeff?
Okay. Well, we can all decide.
But just keep in mind that each of us needs a half a gallon of water every day,
translation.fr:
Mais n'oubliez pas qu'il faut à chacun
deux litres d'eau

translation.en: And right now, we don't even have a day's worth.
translation.fr: Et déjà, on n'a pas de quoi tenir un jour.

translation.en: -[Stacy] A cell phone? A cell phone. -[Mathias] Heinrich!
[Mathias] Yeah, it's his ringtone. We had the same phone.
translation.fr: C'est sa sonnerie. On a le même mobile.

translation.en: [Amy] How can there be a signal? There's no signal up here.
translation.fr: Y a pas de réseau ici.

translation.en: Amy, in the orange tent, there's a lantern hanging
translation.fr: À la tente, il y a une lampe

translation.en: and some matches on the ground. Can you get them?
translation.fr: et des allumettes. Tu les passes ?

translation.en: -Come figure this out. Drop that there. -Okay.
[Jeff] Come on. Amy? All right, pull it now.
-[Eric] This thing needs to be off, right? -[Jeff] Come on.
translation.fr: Ça doit être fermé, non ? Allez.

translation.en: -[Mathias] I need the rope. -[Eric] You got it?
translation.fr:
D'accord. - Prêt ?
- C'est bon. On y va.

translation.en: [Jeff] Yeah, that's it. Let's do this.
translation.fr:
- Prêt ?
- C'est bon. On y va.

translation.en: -Whoa. Up, up, up! -[Amy] Wait, wait, wait!
-[Jeff] Pull it up! Up! -Pull him up! Hurry!
Oh, Jesus. Fuck. Fuck. Oh, my God.
translation.fr:
- Mon Dieu. Merde.
- Oh, mon Dieu.

translation.en: [Jeff] One of you has to go.
translation.fr: L'une de vous doit y aller.

translation.en: [grunts] Down. We're gonna check the rest of the rope
and make sure it's secure. Then one of you--
Why do we have to go? Why can't you or Eric?
translation.fr: Pourquoi nous ? Pourquoi pas toi ou Eric ?
Vous n'avez pas assez de force,

translation.en: We need to work the crank.
Just help him into the sling, and then we're gonna pull him out.
translation.fr: Aide-le à passer le harnais et on le tire.

translation.en: we'll drop the rope and pull you back up, okay?
Stace, you gotta step off. We got you.
translation.fr: Laisse-toi aller. On te lâchera pas.

translation.en: It's the end of the rope!
translation.fr: On est au bout de la corde.
Je me suis ouvert le genou.

translation.en: [Eric] We're gonna send the matches down.
You know, we could take one down, cut the nylon into strips.
translation.fr:
On en démonte une
et on la coupe en lanières.
Je peux plus bouger les jambes.

translation.en: You guys, I think he broke his back! He can't move his legs!
translation.fr:
Je crois qu'il a le dos brisé.
Il peut plus bouger les jambes.

translation.en: We're gonna have to build a backboard.
No way. We can't move him.
Look, we are not leaving him down there, okay?
How about the backpack frames and the tent poles?
[Amy] Are you listening to yourself? Okay, this is insane.
We have to wait for help, okay?
Stacy, we have to build a backboard!
Amy, there's tape in the tent.
Jeff, we cannot move someone with a broken back, okay?
translation.fr: On va pas le bouger avec un dos brisé.

translation.en: -Amy, we have no choice. -You know that!
translation.fr:
- On n'a pas le choix.
- Tu le sais.

translation.en: You have to go down and help lift him on! [Amy] No.
translation.fr: Tu dois descendre et aider à le soulever.

translation.en: -We have to tell them. -[Eric] Tell who?
translation.fr:
- On doit leur dire.
- À qui ?

translation.en: We have to tell them. Maybe they could call someone.
translation.fr:
Il faut leur dire.
Ils peuvent appeler à l'aide.

Il faut leur dire.
Ils peuvent appeler à l'aide. Ils le peuvent.

translation.en: Amy, they're not gonna send for help.
No, we have to try, Jeff.
-Help us, please. -[man yelling in foreign language]

translation.fr: On a besoin de votre aide.

translation.en: -Say it in Spanish. -They don't speak Spanish, Ame.
translation.fr: Dis-le en espagnol. Ils parlent pas espagnol.
Je sais que tu as peur.

translation.en: -I didn't want to come. -Look at me. Amy.
translation.fr: Je voulais pas venir. Regarde-moi. Tout ira bien.

translation.en: -I shouldn't be here. -We're gonna get out of this.
translation.fr:
- On devrait pas être là.
- On s'en sortira.

translation.en: -They have to. No, they have to! -Ame, Ame!
translation.fr: Ils le doivent. Il le faut.

translation.en: I don't want us to get shot, Ame, please.
-Why won't you fucking help us? -[Jeff] Ame!
translation.fr: Putain, pourquoi vous nous aidez pas ?
C'est tout ce qu'il y a.

translation.en: -We have to send it back up. -[Stacy] No, no.
Amy, I can't stay down here any longer.
translation.fr: Je peux pas rester ici plus longtemps.

translation.en: One of us at his shoulders, the other person at his feet.
translation.fr: Une aux épaules, l'autre aux pieds.

translation.en: It's only a couple of feet, Amy. We can just lift him.
translation.fr:
Juste quelques mètres, Amy.
On peut le soulever.

translation.en: [Jeff] Can you still do it, Ame?
Mathias, we're gonna lift you. -Okay? -[Mathias] Okay.
We're gonna lift you up and out of here.
translation.fr: On va te sortir de là.

translation.en: [Amy] If you lift him at the feet, he's gonna bend at the waist.
translation.fr:
Si tu lèves par les pieds,
sa taille va fléchir.

translation.en: Yeah, but I lift him here from his hips, it's gonna arch his back.
translation.fr:
Mais si je lève par les hanches,
ça va lui plier le dos.

translation.en: -[Mathias screaming] -[Amy] Oh, my! Oh, my God!
Maybe we should carry him into the tent...
translation.fr: On devrait le porter à la tente.

translation.en: I don't think we should move him again.
Yeah, but we can't leave him out in the open like this at night.
translation.fr: On peut pas le laisser dehors.

translation.en: Let's see if we can find him some aspirin or something, okay?
translation.fr:
Voyons si on peut lui trouver
de l'aspirine.

translation.en: To keep his blood moving. Guys?
[Jeff] Look in the tents. Check the backpacks.
translation.fr:
Regardons dans les tentes. Vérifions les sacs à dos.
Voyons ce qu'on peut trouver.

translation.en: See what you guys can find.
translation.fr:
Vérifions les sacs à dos.
Voyons ce qu'on peut trouver.
C'est le billet d'avion de Dimitri.

translation.en: He was supposed to leave tomorrow morning.
translation.fr: Il était censé partir demain matin.

translation.en: So when he doesn't show up tomorrow,
his friends are definitely gonna know that something's wrong.
translation.fr: ses amis sauront qu'il y a un problème.

translation.en: How will they know where we are?
They have the map. Dimitri copied the map for them.
translation.fr:
Ils ont une carte.
Dimitri leur a fait une copie.
Au pire, ils seront ici demain.

translation.en: We just have to make it through tonight. That's it.
translation.fr: Il suffit de tenir cette nuit. C'est tout.

translation.en: Maybe one of us should keep watch while the other guys sleep.
translation.fr:
On devrait monter la garde
pendant que les autres dorment.

translation.en: We gotta keep his legs clean.
translation.fr: On devrait lui nettoyer les jambes.

translation.en: That's how it'll happen if it does.
translation.fr: C'est par là qu'il risque le plus.

translation.en: I never should've said to lift him out, should I?
translation.fr: J'aurais pas dû dire de le soulever.

translation.en: I never should have said to lift him.
-Just don't, Stace, okay? Please. -It's my fault.
translation.fr:
- Arrête, Stace.
- C'est de ma faute.

translation.en: We're gonna get him to the hospital tomorrow, okay?
translation.fr: On va le conduire à l'hôpital demain.

translation.en: [Amy] The Greeks will be here tomorrow.
-Get it off! Get it off! -Okay, okay.
Oh, my God. It's inside my leg.
translation.fr: Elle est rentrée dans ma jambe.

translation.en: Get it out! Get it out! Get it out!
-I can feel it moving! -Stop! No. I got it out!
The vine, it was inside her.
Get it off me! Get it off! Jeff!
Mathias! You just sit there and breathe.

translation.fr: Mathias ! Bouge pas et respire. Respire, Mathias.

translation.en: I'm gonna make a tourniquet right now and cut off this bleeding, Mathias.
translation.fr:
On va faire un garrot,
arrêter cette hémorragie.

translation.en: I don't know how long these'll burn, so you're gonna have to be quick.
translation.fr:
Combien de temps ça va tenir ?
Vous devrez faire vite.

translation.en: I'd wait to light them till you're both down there.
translation.fr: Attendez d'être en bas pour allumer.

translation.en: Link arms. One of you look to the right, the other, your left.
translation.fr: L'une regarde à droite, l'autre à gauche.

translation.en: You'll cover more ground that way.
translation.fr: Pour un meilleur champ de vision.

translation.en: Search a spot and then move on. Okay?
translation.fr: Fouillez un endroit et avancez. D'accord ?

translation.en: Come on. We have to find it.

translation.fr:
- Ça vient de là.
- Je peux pas.

- Ça vient de là.
- Je peux pas. - Viens.
- Je veux pas y aller.

translation.en: I don't wanna go in there. Amy.
translation.fr:
- Viens.
- Je veux pas y aller.

translation.en: [screaming] Pull us up! Pull it up!
Did you find the phone, Amy?
No, there is no fucking phone!
translation.fr: Y a pas de putain de téléphone !

translation.en: What do you mean, the flower was making the ring?
It was vibrating and it was ringing like a cell phone.
translation.fr: Ça vibrait et ça sonnait comme un mobile.

translation.en: How? Amy, how does it do that?
[tearful] I don't know, Eric. I don't know.
It was moving. It was alive. It knows we're here.
translation.fr: C'est vivant. Elle sait qu'on est là.

translation.en: -We just have to go. We just... -We can't do that, Stace.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on parte. On peut pas.

translation.en: Jeff, you didn't see it. Okay?
If we try to leave, they kill us.
translation.fr: Si on essaie de fuir, ils nous tueront.

translation.en: Mathias can't move. I can't just leave him here.
translation.fr:
Mathias peut pas bouger.
On va pas le laisser.

translation.en: Okay, maybe we don't all have to go. I mean, I could go. I can get help.
translation.fr:
Pas besoin d'y aller tous. Moi, je peux.
Je peux chercher de l'aide.

translation.en: There are 50 of them, 60. They killed that little kid, Amy.
translation.fr:
Ils sont au moins cinquante, soixante.
Ils ont tué ce gamin.

translation.en: [Eric] Okay, so you guys make a distraction.
-I can make it to the Jeep. I can do it. -It's too dangerous, Eric.
translation.fr: je cours à la Jeep. C'est trop dangereux.

translation.en: We have to wait. Wait for what, huh?
the Greeks can't find their own fucking hotel room.
translation.fr:
Ils trouvent même pas
leur chambre.
Ils nous ont mis en quarantaine.

translation.en: We are being kept here to die!
translation.fr: Ils nous gardent ici pour mourir !

translation.en: Four Americans on a vacation don't just disappear!
translation.fr:
Quatre Américains en vacances
disparaissent pas ainsi !

translation.en: somebody, somebody is going to find us.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un va bien finir par nous trouver.

translation.en: We just have to be alive when they do.
translation.fr: Faut juste qu'on reste en vie.

translation.en: [Eric] Amy, where are the keys? They're in the backpack.
translation.fr:
- Amy, elles sont où ?
- Dans le sac à dos.

translation.en: No. We stay close. We wait until we're found.
translation.fr:
On reste ensemble.
On attend d'être trouvés.

translation.en: We keep someone always on guard, we keep our wounds covered,
translation.fr: On monte la garde. On panse nos plaies.

translation.en: and we look out after each other. That is the only way.
translation.fr:
Et on se tient les coudes.
C'est notre seule chance.

translation.en: [Stacy] It's still in there. I can feel it.
translation.fr: C'est toujours là. Je peux la sentir.

translation.en: See, look how puffy it is.
[Amy] It's just what happens when you cut yourself, okay?
translation.fr: C'est normal quand on se coupe.

translation.en: [Jeff] He won't last much longer like this.
translation.fr: Il va pas tenir longtemps comme ça.

translation.en: We have to cut them off. Cut what off?
translation.fr:
- On va devoir les couper.
- Quoi ?

translation.en: He'll die if we don't. Just please tell me you're joking.
translation.fr:
- Sinon, il va mourir.
- Dis-moi que c'est une blague.

translation.en: He'll get infected, if he isn't already. Septicemia.
translation.fr:
Ça va s'infecter. Si c'est pas déjà fait.
La septicémie.

translation.en: Well, what the hell is septicemia, Jeff?
An infection, usually in the bones, when it's exposed to bacteria.
translation.fr:
Une infection. Elle atteint les os
exposés aux bactéries.

translation.en: No, I'm telling you, he won't last through the day like this.
translation.fr: Sinon, il passera pas la journée.

translation.en: He has no feeling beneath his waist.
translation.fr: Il ne sent plus rien sous la taille.

translation.en: The tourniquets are already in place. We're gonna cut below them.
translation.fr:
Les garrots sont déjà là,
on coupe dessous.

translation.en: We have to break the bones first and then cut.
translation.fr: On brise d'abord les os puis on coupe.

translation.en: We're not cutting his legs off with a fucking hunting knife, Jeff.
translation.fr:
On va pas l'amputer
avec un couteau de chasse !

translation.en: [Jeff] There's no flesh covering his bones, Eric.
translation.fr: Il n'a plus de chair sur ses os.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, fine. Let's fucking vote.
You know, raise your hands if you want to cut off his legs.
translation.fr: Levez la main pour qu'on l'ampute.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, he's in med school.
He's not a surgeon. He's not a doctor. He's in school.
translation.fr: Mais il n'est ni chirurgien ni médecin.

translation.en: I'm entitled to my vote, Eric.
I'll break the bones first, with the stone, then use the knife to cut through.
translation.fr:
Je brise les os avec une pierre,
puis je découpe au couteau.

translation.en: We're heating the pan to cauterize the wounds to stop the bleeding.
translation.fr:
Je chauffe cette poêle
pour cautériser les plaies.

translation.en: [Jeff] You're not gonna be able to feel a thing,
but if you want to bite down on this,
translation.fr: Mais si tu veux, tu peux mordre ça.

translation.en: You should wait in the tent.
He can't feel anything beneath his waist.
translation.fr: Il peut rien sentir sous la taille.

translation.en: He was screaming. He was telling you to stop.
He was screaming. How could he not feel it when he was screaming?
translation.fr:
Comment pouvait-il
ne rien sentir et crier ?

translation.en: -It was him looking down and seeing it. -This is so not okay!
translation.fr:
- Juste le fait de se voir.
- C'est pas bien !

translation.en: We didn't have a choice, Amy.
[Amy whispering] Oh, my God. Holy shit.
[Amy] Look, how can it do that?
Do you think Stacy's gonna be okay?
translation.fr: Tu crois que ça va aller pour Stacy ?

translation.en: I mean, I got it out. I saw it come out.
translation.fr: Je l'ai arrachée. Je l'ai vue sortir.

translation.en: She gets something in her head and...
translation.fr: Quand elle a quelque chose en tête et...
réussir à nous trouver un jour ?

translation.en: I think making a run for it is our only chance.
translation.fr:
Je pense
que la fuite est notre seule chance.

Je t'ai entendu. - T'as entendu quoi ?
- Que tu la baisais.

- T'as entendu quoi ?
- Que tu la baisais.

translation.en: -Don't lie to me, Eric. I heard you. -Stace.
translation.fr: Me mens pas, j'ai tout entendu.

translation.en: I heard you. I heard you fucking her!
[Stacy screaming] How could you do that to me?
translation.fr: Pourquoi vous me faites un truc pareil ?

translation.en: How could you guys fucking sit there and fuck when I'm in the tent?
translation.fr:
Comment pouvez-vous baiser ici
lorsque je suis dans la tente ?

translation.en: Stace, you need to calm down.
Don't tell me what I should do.
-Stacy, you know I wouldn't do that. -I heard you, Eric.
translation.fr:
Je ferais jamais ça. - Je t'ai entendu.
- On parlait...

translation.en: -[Amy] We were just talking. I was just... -[Stacy] I heard you moaning, Amy.
translation.fr:
- Je t'ai entendu.
- On parlait... - Je t'ai entendu gémir.
- Je pleurais.

- Je t'ai entendu gémir.
- Je pleurais.

translation.en: What's going on? My boyfriend is fucking your girlfriend!
translation.fr:
- Qu'y a-t-il ?
- Mon petit ami baisait ta petite amie.

translation.en: -That's what's going on. -She's just crazy and irrational.
You think she's never cheated on you?
-Fuck you! Fuck you! -[Amy] Fuck you, bitch!
All you ever cared about is your fucking self!
She would've slept with Mathias if I hadn't stopped her.
translation.fr:
Elle se serait fait Mathias
si j'avais pas été là.

translation.en: Well, thank God we cut his legs off.
translation.fr: Ça valait le coup de l'amputer !

translation.en: It's eating me like it's eating him.

translation.fr: C'est en moi. C'est à l'intérieur de moi.

translation.en: It's inside... It's inside of me.
translation.fr:
C'est en moi. C'est à l'intérieur de moi. - C'est en moi.
- Stacy.

translation.en: It's in my side, Amy. It's in my... It's...
translation.fr:
- C'est dans mon torse, Amy. C'est...
- Stace.

translation.en: I'll show you. It's here. If you just cut here and here...
translation.fr:
Je vais te montrer.
Il suffit d'ouvrir ici et ici...

- Tu n'as rien.
- Tu n'écoutes pas !

- Tu n'as rien.
- Tu n'écoutes pas ! Tu comprends pas.

translation.en: [plants] You're not listening to me! You're not listening to me!
[plants] You're not listening to me! You're not listening to me!
You're not listening to me! You're not listening to me!
translation.fr:
Tu m'écoutes pas !
Tu m'écoutes pas !

translation.en: [plants screaming] You're not listening to me!
[Jeff] They don't want us to spread it. That's why they won't let us leave.
translation.fr:
Ils veulent pas que ça se répande.
Ils nous tiennent captifs.
Pour que ça se propage pas.

translation.en: It's old. It has to be. Really old.
translation.fr:
C'est vieux.
Ça doit l'être. Vraiment vieux.
Parce que... les oiseaux, les insectes,

translation.en: somehow they've learned not to land here.
translation.fr: ils ont appris à éviter ce lieu.

translation.en: And the horses. Remember? How frightened the horses were?
translation.fr:
Et les chevaux. Tu te souviens ?
Ils avaient peur.
Ce qu'elle a dit sur Mathias.

translation.en: -I didn't... -You don't have to say anything.

translation.fr: Je veux pas que tu croies...

translation.en: We're gonna start with the one in your leg. Okay, Stace?
translation.fr: On va attaquer par la jambe ?

translation.en: [Jeff] You might wanna close your eyes.
I wanna see. I wanna see it.
translation.fr: Je veux voir. Je veux la voir.

translation.en: [Amy] Good. Just keep breathing, keep breathing.

translation.fr: Bien. Continue à respirer. Continue de respirer.

translation.en: -Okay. Okay. -[Jeff] I got it. [Amy] All right, he's almost done.
[Jeff] Should I stop? Stacy, do you want me to stop?
translation.fr: Tu veux que j'arrête ? Tu veux ?

translation.en: [Stacy] I'm scared. No. It's okay. Keep breathing.
translation.fr:
- J'ai peur. Non.
- Continue à respirer.

translation.en: [Amy] He got all of it. The shirt up.
translation.fr:
- Il a tout sorti.
- Remonte ton t-shirt.

translation.en: There's more of it. There's more.
Right here. Under... Under the muscle, like by the bone there.
translation.fr:
Il en reste, juste ici.
Sous le muscle, près de l'os.

translation.en: Yes, can we cut it? There's no more cutting.
translation.fr:
- Si. On peut la couper ?
- On coupe plus rien.

translation.en: I wanna cut it. I wanna cut it.
-I wanna cut it. I wanna... -[Eric] Hey, don't!
Hey! You can't. You can't keep cutting.
translation.fr:
Tu peux pas.
Tu peux pas continuer à couper.

translation.en: -It's just everywhere. It's in my head. -[Eric] No.
translation.fr: C'est partout. C'est dans ma tête.

translation.en: -[Eric] It's okay. You're okay. -[Stacy] No, no.
Yeah, you're okay. No, no. I'm not okay. I'm not okay.
You keep saying I'm okay. I'm not okay. Why do you keep saying that to me?
translation.fr:
Non, ça va pas, et toi tu dis que ça va.
Pourquoi tu dis tout le temps ça ?

translation.en: Amy, did you see it? You saw it, didn't you?
You saw it in my head. I felt it.
translation.fr: C'est dans ma tête. Je l'ai sentie.

translation.en: Why won't you look at me?
You saw it? Did you see it? No, I... There's nothing there.
translation.fr:
- Pas vrai ?
- Non, y a rien.

translation.en: [Eric] There's nothing there, okay? I swear.
translation.fr: Il n'y a rien, je le jure.

translation.en: It's in my head. I feel it, you guys.
translation.fr: C'est dans ma tête, je la sens bien.

translation.en: [Amy] Let's move her in the tent.
No one's coming. I'm going tonight.
translation.fr: Personne viendra. Je file ce soir.

translation.en: [vines mimicking Stacy] I wanna cut it. I wanna cut it.
[vines] I wanna cut it. I wanna cut it. I wanna cut it.

translation.fr: Tout va bien. Tout va bien.

translation.en: I just... I just have to get this one out.
Just have to get this one. [grunting]
Give it to me right now. -No! -[Jeff exclaims]
I'm very sorry. I have to get this piece right here...
translation.fr: Je suis désolée. Je veux juste retirer ce bout-là.
Je veux juste retirer ce bout-là.

translation.en: -Stacy, give me the knife. Stacy. -[Stacy grunting]
[crying] Amy, I didn't mean to! I'm sorry!
translation.fr:
J'ai pas voulu faire ça !
Je suis désolée !

translation.en: [Stacy screaming] Eric! Eric! Come here. Come here.
[Stacy] Yes! Kill me! Kill me. Kill me! [Amy sobbing] No!
[vines] Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!
[vines mimicking Stacy] Kill me! Kill me!
Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!

translation.fr: Dès que tu as dépassé la clairière...

translation.en: you run as fast as you can, okay?
translation.fr:
tu cours, aussi vite que tu peux,
d'accord ?

translation.en: When you get to the Jeep,
translation.fr: Quand tu arrives à la Jeep,

translation.en: you don't wait for anything. Anything.
And if these don't work, then you run,
translation.fr:
Et si c'est pas les bonnes clefs,
alors tu cours...

translation.en: and you don't stop until you reach the town.
translation.fr:
et tu t'arrêtes pas
avant d'arriver en ville.

translation.en: You promise me that you'll still be here?
translation.fr: Tu me promets que tu seras toujours là ?

translation.en: You don't even know her name.
translation.fr: Vous connaissez même pas son nom.

translation.en: You don't know any of our names.
translation.fr: Vous connaissez aucun de nos noms.
Je suis Jeff. Jeff Dean McIntyre.

translation.en: I was gonna be a doctor.
You should know her name, too.
translation.fr: Vous devez aussi connaître son nom.

translation.en: And she is not gonna die on this fucking hill!
translation.fr:
Et elle crèvera pas
sur cette colline de merde !

Et elle crèvera pas
sur cette colline de merde ! Jeff !

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come on...
